messages.message: I am looking at merging https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/12721 which resolves the last of the issues with the server-nginx and reload, though it does require a slight workflow modification to use (you can use the prebuilt docker image for server-nginx with reload enabled, or you can build it yourself). It *does* introduce breaking changes for LEGACY support with reload enabled, however this change will not break LEGACY support for regression tests.
To clarify, you would no longer have to use LEGACY for reload support, you would run the `server-nginx` service with reload support :slightly_smiling_face:
If anyone has any feedback or caveats before I merge, please update the PR! I will probably merge tomorrow morning around 10AM eastern.
Iâ€™m also emailing eng, including some specifics around using it.
